name: Ys SEVEN
description: Experience the first “modern-era” Ys game, now off the small screen for its worldwide PC debut! Features a full party system, dozens of unique combat skills, and a massive overworld to explore. Uncover the secret of the Five Great Dragons, and help Adol Christin save the day once again!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™i5　2.4GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 Intel® HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: HD Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™i5-6400 CPU @2.70GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX950 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: HD Audio
